name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and implementing high-performance software solutions. Proficient in **Java**, **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, and **RESTful APIs**, with solid expertise in building **GraphQL** and message-driven APIs. Skilled in containerization technologies like **Docker** and adept in **Serverless** architecture, ensuring efficient deployment and scalability. Experienced in **Continuous Delivery** practices and **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** to foster high-quality code. Strong background in **Model-View-Controller (MVC)** design, **Object-Relational Mapping (ORM)**, and working with both **Relational** and **NoSQL** databases, showcasing a versatile approach to data management.
 
Demonstrated success in agile frameworks such as **Scrum**, complemented by excellent problem-solving skills and a collaborative mindset that enhances **cross-team collaboration**. Known for conducting meticulous **code reviews** to elevate code quality and adherence to best practices. Additionally, I bring extensive experience in full-stack development using modern frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I am committed to building secure, maintainable solutions that meet compliance standards while delivering impactful applications.
